summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SOC IOC Analysis Tool. Backend APIs working well with 88.2% success rate. Frontend fully functional with 100% success rate. All core features tested including IOC detection, single/bulk analysis, and vendor intelligence integration.

minor_validation_issues.issue: Returns 200 with 'unknown' type instead of 400 for empty/invalid IOCs
minor_validation_issues.impact: Minor - doesn't affect functionality, just validation behavior

passed_tests: Backend health check with all API keys available
IOC detection for all types (IP, domain, URL, email, MD5, SHA1, SHA256)
Single IOC analysis for IP addresses and domains
Bulk IOC analysis with multiple IOCs
Frontend page loading and dashboard display
Analysis button functionality and loading states
Analysis results display with threat levels and vendor cards
Bulk mode toggle and textarea input
Bulk analysis results in accordion format
Clear functionality returning to empty state
Error-free page operation with no console errors
